title: [Large-scale] Strategy to Improve Adoption Rates Through Optimization of Shelter Dog Training Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Animal Shelter Operations and Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Targets animal welfare corporate managers, emphasizing hierarchical training system design and competency measurement.

learning_goals: Designing a three-tier hierarchical training process based on behavioral characteristics of shelter dogs
Developing metrics to assess changes in adoption rates before and after implementing a training program
Creating and demonstrating customized training manuals for team members (volunteers/staff)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
